user.title: AVR details
user.description: Enter the details for the Pioneer AVR:

data.sources: Source name to AVR source ID mapping (JSON, use empty dict to query from AVR)
data.max_source_id: Maximum source ID that automatic source identification will check
data.max_volume: Maximum volume units for Main Zone
data.max_volume_zonex: Maximum volume units for Zones other than the Main Zone
data.power_on_volume_bounce:
Main Zone power on volume reporting workaround
(required on VSX-930 with initial volume set)
data.volume_step_only: Emulate volume level set by stepping volume up/down (for VSX-S510)
data.volume_step_delta: Volume units changed per volume step command
data.ignore_zone_2: Don't create entity for Zone 2 (on next restart)
data.ignore_zone_3: Don't create entity for Zone 3 (on next restart)
data.ignore_zone_Z: Don't create entity for HDZone (on next restart)
data.debug_listener: Enable debug messages for listener task
data.debug_responder: Enable debug messages for responder task
data.debug_updater: Enable debug messages for updater task

error.invalid_sources: Invalid JSON dictionary specified for source name mapping
